urls.description: Miles on a Mission Find a cause that speaks to you. Then donate your miles to make a difference. Your do nations to Miles on a Mission have raised 377,169,448 miles since 2019. Giving Tuesday, November 29 – December 2, 2022 - Terms and Conditions You must be a MileagePlus ® member before voting or donating to participate. To join MileagePlus for free, go to united.com. Donations must be made by MileagePlus members at donate.mileageplus.com and must be a minimum of 1,000 miles. United will match MileagePlus

urls.description: Vote for your favorite charity from November 29 – December 2, 2022, and we’ ll award the top three organizations with 1-million-mile grants. Please sign in to MileagePlus ® – or join for free – before casting your vote. Voting is free. Limit one vote per MileagePlus member. Together we can reach our goal of donating 30 million miles to more than 50 charities. urls.title: The EDGE Foundation
urls.description: Donated miles will be used to support: Travel to the EDGE Summer Program and Symposium. The EDGE Summer Program is a four week intensive program that prepares a cohort of women to succeed in their math PhD program and thrive in their careers.The EDGE Summer Symposium is a larger networking event that invites members of the wider community to form lasting professional connections. Travel to the EDGE Session at the Joint Mathematics Meetings. This session, held at the largest math conference in the US, highlights the research of graduate students, postdoctoral researchers, and early-career faculty from the EDGE community. Travel to conference and research collaborations. The EDGE community is 300 women strong. Your miles will support members of our community to develop their careers, deepen professional connections, and contribute cutting-edge research findings. All donated miles will be used to support travel by women and/or members of underrepresented racial minority groups in the math

urls.title: Shriner's Hospital (Miles on a Mission)
urls.description: Since opening the doors of our first hospital in Shreveport, Louisiana, in 1922, Shriners Hospitals for Children has grown into one of the finest pediatric specialty health care systems in the world. Thanks to the dedication and hard work of members of the Shriners International fraternity; the organization that founded and continues to support the health care system; one hospital soon became two, two became 10, and by 1958, 22 Shriners Hospitals for Children were making a difference in the lives of children in the U.S., Canada and Mexico. What has never changed over the years is Shriners Hospitals for Children's dedication to providing the best specialty medical care to children, regardless of a family's ability to pay. So today, Shriners Hospitals for Children builds on its history, honors its deeply rooted traditions, and conveys our compassion, expertise and dedication to improving the lives of children.How we use donated award milesWhen we opened our first hospital our goal was to

urls.title: Airlink (Miles on a Mission)
urls.description: Airlink is a global humanitarian organization delivering critical aid to communities in crisis by providing airlift and logistical solutions to nonprofit partners, changing the way the humanitarian community responds to disasters around the world. Today, Airlink's network consists of more than 50 airlines and logistics partners and 130+ international nonprofit partners. Your support provides free flights and services for both rapid response and longer-term recovery operations for multiple relief partners.

data.text:
On this #GivingTuesday our Signature Lead Partner @united will match your donations mile for mile! 🎉

Your support will go a long way in making flights possible for the teams of our 130+ nonprofit partners responding to crises and disasters. ✈️ 

🔗 https://t.co/CKHOQ11hhE https://t.co/YspYq2ghWK

urls.title: MileagePlus Miles on a Mission
urls.description: Miles on a Mission Find a cause that speaks to you. Then donate your miles to make a difference. Your do nations to Miles on a Mission have raised 377,169,448 miles since 2019. Giving Tuesday, November 29 – December 2, 2022 - Terms and Conditions You must be a MileagePlus ® member before voting or donating to participate. To join MileagePlus for free, go to united.com. Donations must be made by MileagePlus members at donate.mileageplus.com and must be a minimum of 1,000 miles. United will match MileagePlus

data.text: Every single @united MileagePlus mile you donate today is matched up to 1,000 miles and  goes a  long way towards helping kids access the specialized medical care they need at @shrinershosp! Donate now: https://t.co/xSHuxwM1Zr  #MilesOnAMission #GivingTuesday https://t.co/VaDVDIjqaG
